dct_title_s: A map of Bengal, Bahar, Oude & Allahabad : with part of Agra and Delhi, exhibiting the course of the Ganges from Hurdwar to the
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,500,000. Pictorial relief. Dedicated to John Stables. Dimensions: 72 x 106 centimeters
